titleStmt.title: The trial of the ladies Hide Park, May Day, or, The yellow books partner
titleStmt.author: W. B. (William Blake), fl. 1650-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Mr. Butler ...,

notesStmt.note: "First published in 1656 with title: The trial of the ladies"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
